TextView.android:text: Treta Education, a division of Treta Company that develops educational apps, created Eternal Education. In 2020, the treta company was founded. All ninth- and tenth-graders who attend Eternal Education are given a free education. The UI and UX of our app will be changed in the upcoming update in an effort to make it more user-friendly. Along with class 9 and class 10 classes, we will also add a few more distinct courses to our app.
